database2_test module

database2_test.sample_item1()[source]

Fixture for a sample item data dictionary. :return: Dictionary representing a sample item. :rtype: dict

database2_test.sample_item2()[source]

Fixture for a sample item :return: Dictionary representing a sample item. :rtype: dict

database2_test.sample_item3()[source]

Fixture for a sample item data dictionary (item_id: 3). :return: Dictionary representing a sample item. :rtype: dict

database2_test.sample_item4()[source]

Fixture for a sample item data dictionary. :return: Dictionary representing a sample item. :rtype: dict

database2_test.setup_test_inventory()[source]

Fixture to set up a test inventory database and create the inventory table.

database2_test.test_add_item(setup_test_inventory, sample_item1)[source]

Test if adding an item is successful. :param setup_test_inventory: Fixture to set up the test inventory database. :param sample_item1: Fixture for a sample item data dictionary.

database2_test.test_connect_to_db()[source]

Test if connecting to the inventory database is successful.

database2_test.test_create_inventory_table(setup_test_inventory)[source]

Test if creating the inventory table is successful. The setup_test_inventory fixture ensures that the table is created before running this test. :param setup_test_inventory: Fixture to set up the test inventory database.

database2_test.test_deduce_item_from_stock(setup_test_inventory, sample_item4)[source]

Test if deducting an item from stock is successful. :param setup_test_inventory: Fixture to set up the test inventory database. :param sample_item4: Fixture for a sample item data dictionary.

database2_test.test_get_all_items(setup_test_inventory, sample_item1)[source]

Test if getting all items returns the correct number of items. Already added item 1 in a previous test. :param setup_test_inventory: Fixture to set up the test inventory database. :param sample_item1: Fixture for a sample item data dictionary.

database2_test.test_get_item_by_id(setup_test_inventory, sample_item2)[source]

Test if getting an item by ID returns the correct item. :param setup_test_inventory: Fixture to set up the test inventory database. :param sample_item2: Fixture for a sample item data dictionary (item_id: 2). :return: None :rtype: None

database2_test.test_get_item_by_name(setup_test_inventory, sample_item3)[source]

Test if getting an item by name returns the correct item. :param setup_test_inventory: Fixture to set up the test inventory database. :param sample_item3: Fixture for a sample item data dictionary (item_id: 3). :return: None :rtype: None

database2_test.test_update_item(setup_test_inventory, sample_item2)[source]

Test if updating an item is successful. :param setup_test_inventory: Fixture to set up the test inventory database. :param sample_item2: Fixture for a sample item data dictionary (item_id: 2).
